response.overview: Music & Musicals, Classical Music, Classical Instrumental Music - Classical pianist Stephen Kovacevich demonstrates why he is considered one of the premier modern interpreters of Beethoven's works in this performance recorded at La Roque d'Anth√©ron, France. The concert features the composer's sonatas for piano op. 110 and 111, as well as pieces by Schubert. With close-ups on Kovacevich's hands, face and feet, this presentation reveals how he creates such a powerful and moving sound.
response.title: Stephen Kovacevich: Beethoven: Piano Sonatas
